captions.text: Six months ago I lost control of my powers, and froze my home town of Arendelle.
Wait, I don't have my tiara!
No one takes a photo like Gaston.
Oh, It's just like the castle you always dreamed of...

What's the deal with her? She won't let me
eat

That's nothing compared to what she did to
her mom.
was to find the bear that is smarter than all the other bears
I think I have a prison wife.
Did you build a snowman together?
So who's waiting for you the outside?

My prince charming is going to throw me
the biggest, fanciest wedding ever!
I don't really... Believe in prince charming.

Oh I know you're not reading one of my books
bitch

Since I got here I've been chased
Attacked
So can you please just cut me some slack.

Elsa! you're nothing like any of these princesses.
You're a queen!
I am no different than anybody else in here.

And Being in here is no one's fault by my
own.
